sentences.en: Am I too sluttish? She thinks quickly. But her movement is faster than it.
sentences.cn: 我不是荡妇吧, 她飞快地想着,但是她的行动比她的想法要快.

sentences.en: He sat down in the sluttish armchair and undid the straps of the brief - case.
sentences.cn: 他在那张邋遢的沙发上坐下来,把公文包的搭扣带松开.

words.tran_cn: 邋遢的；懒惰的；淫荡的；不端庄的
